content.html: It took me a long time of thinking “why is someone promoting this obvious parody into my timeline” before i worked out that this is not, in fact, a parody. Sure let’s wind the clock back to when only royalty were allowed to wear purple, great idea everyone
content.value:
It took me a long time of thinking “why is someone promoting this obvious parody into my timeline” before i worked out that this is not, in fact, a parody. 

Sure let’s wind the clock back to when only royalty were allowed to wear purple, great idea everyone
